items.sentence: I think you\'re going to have problems with Tom.
Tom has asked us to make sure we arrive on time.
Tom didn\'t realize Mary was John\'s girlfriend.
Tom didn\'t realize that Mary couldn\'t do that.
Why didn\'t you give Tom the money he asked for?
Why didn\'t you tell me you were from Australia?
That sounds like something a teenager would say.
That was harder to do than Tom said it would be.
I can\'t help but think we\'re making a mistake.
I can\'t promise anything, but I\'ll do my best.
Why don\'t Tom and Mary want to go to Australia?
Why don\'t you try to do that with Tom tomorrow?
Tom made a reservation at a Japanese restaurant.
Tom made it home just before it started raining.
Tom made me promise not to say anything to Mary.
Tom told me to meet him in front of the theater.
I thought that Tom was going to want to do that.
I thought that Tom was interested in doing that.
Would it be OK if I discussed it with my family?
Would you like to go out for a drink after work?
